question: List all banquet halls and conference rooms with a 200 person capacity.
sql_query1:
SELECT EventSpaces.Name 
FROM EventSpaces
WHERE (EventSpaces.Event_Space = "Banquet Hall" OR EventSpaces.Event_Space = "Conference Room") AND EventSpaces.Capacity = 200
sql_query2:
SELECT EventSpaces.Name 
FROM EventSpaces
WHERE EventSpaces.Event_Space = "Banquet Hall" OR EventSpaces.Event_Space = "Conference Room" AND EventSpaces.Capacity = 200
interpretation1: Show all banquet halls and conference rooms where either can hold 200 people.
interpretation2: List all of the banquet halls, in addition show the 200 capacity conference rooms.
